presentation.resalt: Information Technology Engineer, Software Developer and Programming content creator
presentation.outro: from Ecuador, Ibarra ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¨. Specialized in the development of impactful mobile and web applications.

optimized: Use Google Chrome for a better experience

exp1.title: Software Developer
exp1.description: Responsible for creating and optimizing web and mobile applications. Improving user experience and process efficiency. Implementation of continuous production with A/B testing.

exp2.title: Mobile Developer
exp2.description: Development of mobile applications with hybrid and native technologies. Implementation of RESTful services, Auth0, Storage. Integration of third-party services such as Firebase and deployment in application stores (Google Play Store, Apple Store).

exp3.title: CTI - UX/UI Designer
exp3.description: Design of user interfaces and user experience for web and mobile applications. Creation of prototypes and usability tests. Implementation of responsive design and accessibility.

exp4.title: Content Creator
exp4.description: Creation of educational content in programming and software development. Tutorials, courses, tips and tricks for the developer community. Member of the Google Ecuador developer community - GDG QUITO.

1.title: Swapme - Clothing Exchange Application
1.description: Mobile application for the exchange of clothing. Implementation of authentication services, storage, etc. Deployment in Google Play Store application stores.

2.title: UX/UI Design - Nike App
2.description: User interface and user experience design for the Nike application. Creation of prototypes and usability tests. Implementation of responsive and accessible design.

3.title: Nike App Redesign - UI/UX
3.description: Redesign of the Nike application. Implementation of responsive and accessible design. Creation of prototypes and usability tests.

4.title: Web Imbabura Candidates
4.description: Web platform for the management of candidates for the province of Imbabura. Implementation of candidate registration, search, etc. Deployment on local servers.

5.title: Diigo - Landing Page
5.description: Landing page for the Diigo application. Implementation of contact form, subscription, etc. Deployment on the web.

6.title: Spiccy - Healty Food Recipes
6.description: Healthy food recipes website. Implementation of contact form, recipe storage, etc. Deployment on the web.

7.title: WalkiDogs - Pet Walking WebApp
7.description: Web application for pet walking services. Implementation of user registration, pet registration, etc. Deployment on local servers.

8.title: GifSearch - Gifs API
8.description: Gifs API for consumption by web and mobile applications. Implementation of RESTful services, use of Giphy Api. Deployment on Vercel.

9.title: CriptoCotizador - Cryptocurrency API
9.description: Cryptocurrency API for consumption by web and mobile applications. Implementation of RESTful services, use of CoinGecko Api. Deployment on Vercel.

10.title: Pinia Store - Ecommerce
10.description: Online store of technology products. Implementation of shopping cart, product search, etc. Deployment on local vercel.

11.title: Laravel Hotel - Booking System
11.description: Hotel reservation system. Implementation of room reservation, user registration, etc. Deployment on local servers.

12.title: Cielo Verde Spanish School
12.description: Website for the Spanish school Cielo Verde. Implementation of contact form, course registration, etc. Deployment on web servers.

13.title: Hotel Mongo DB
13.description: Hotel room reservation system. Implementation of room reservation, user registration, etc. Deployment on local servers.

14.title: Document Management PUCE-I
14.description: Document management system for the Pontifical Catholic University of Ecuador - Ibarra. Implementation of reports to students enrolled and graduated from 1976 to 2023. Deployment on local servers.

15.title: Pokedex - Pokemon API
15.description: Pokemon search application. Implementation of pokemon search, pokemon storage, etc. Deployment on the web.

16.title: Blog - Ideas and Trends
16.description: Blog of ideas and trends on any topic. Implementation of Authentication, comments and image uploads. Deployment on FirebaseHosting.

17.title: GDG Guayaquill - Desing UX/UI
17.description: Design of user interfaces and user experience for the GDG Guayaquil community. Creation of prototypes and usability tests. Implementation of responsive design and accessibility.

25.title: Venturex - International Trade Platform
25.description: Statistical queries of products from different countries. Implementation of global searches with data. Deployment on Vercel.
